App_Data.Name: Summary_Long
App_Data.Value: Deystvie razvivaetsya v nachale XIX stoletiya. Beglyy katorzhnik Zhan Val'zhan, prigovorennyy k tyuremnomu zaklyucheniyu, vynuzhden dolgie gody skryvat'sya ot zhestokogo pravosudiya. Inspektor parizhskoy policii Zhaver schitaet ego poimku delom vsey svoey zhizni. Posle smerti Fantiny — zhenschiny, za sud'bu kotoroy Zhan Val'zhan schital sebya v otvete, — edinstvennym blizkim emu chelovekom ostaetsya ee doch' Kozetta. Radi schast'ya devushki Zhan gotov na vse.

App_Data.Name: Summary_Long_Ru

Inspektor parizhskoy policii Zhaver schitaet ego poimku delom vsey svoey zhizni. Posle smerti Fantiny — zhenschiny, za sud'bu kotoroy Zhan Val'zhan schital sebya v otvete, — edinstvennym blizkim emu chelovekom ostaetsya ee doch' Kozetta. Radi schast'ya devushki Zhan gotov na vse.
